title: What are some prompts I could use for writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: A child is invited to join a secret society of children which runs the world, since adults aren’t paying attention and only care about their wallets.An awful virus sweeps the world, and makes things quickly worse. People who’re infected can only talk in verse. A researcher destroys a drug, the only hope they had, because he likes the opera, it’s really not that bad.A nanotechnology researcher accidentally invents a new and beautiful colour.A government passes laws mandating good taste. People with tattoos must be judged by the art board. Those with ugly tattoos are fined and must wear clothing to cover them.A Japanese company makes microwave ovens with a voice control chip that’s as intelligent as a human being. A court rules that throwing your old microwave away is murder.An eleventh commandment is discovered on a rock in Jerusalem: If people ask for help, you have to help them and not tell them that what they want to do is wrong. This causes people to abandon the internet.IBM invents a drive that can store ten petabytes on a soda cracker. A dog accidentally eats the American tax code before it can be published.The latest version of MS Word has a spell and grammar checker, and a common sense checker. It refuses to let most people write at all.Lego makes a new type of brick which can stop a nuclear explosion.An archaeologist deciphers music and finds it’s the language our unconscious minds use to talk to each other. It’s not very polite.
Good writing requires THINKING!!!!Do you not think that Write Better, Get Published, Be Creative | WritersDigest.com is a better place to go to get so called prompts than Quora?Think about it.
